message.content:
I need to calculate the Net Profit Margin based on the income statement.

The Net Profit Margin is calculated as:
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%

From the income statement:
- Net Profit = $707,199.17
- Total Revenue = $5,064,939.23

Calculating Net Profit Margin:
Net Profit Margin = ($707,199.17 / $5,064,939.23) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 0.1396 × 100%
Net Profit Margin = 13.96%

```json
{"solution": {'Net Profit Margin': '13.96%'}}
```
